category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_search_external_ref_links_on_save
preference.preference_description: Set the CATIA_search_external_ref_links_on_save variable to true to search MML Links outside the assembly (ref-ref relationships) during the Save process to save them along with the assembly. Set this variable to false to prevent searching for ref-ref relationships.
